attributes.action: Block the takeover of Cadbury's by Kraft, protect it as an institution like other countries protect their cherished businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cadbury's is a British institution, it should be saved from being polluted by the influence of a greedy corporation. Through their Quaker heritage they have always stood for moral fortitude and what's right with the world, what will become of this highly respected company now? Let's put an end to this!

rejection.details: The Competition Commission are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
